segments.text: How can she just stand there polishing that plate while the sink floods?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's pouring onto the floor, and she's clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are sneaking cookies like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that ridiculous stool, risking a fall for a snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's egging him on, hand outstretched for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They know they're not supposed to touch that jar without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the puddle's growing; someone's going to slip and break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view mocks this messy interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the adult isn't paying attention to any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked high, water damage impendingâ€”it's infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those children need a good talking-to about safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a recipe for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn around, lady; see what's happening!
segments.speaker: PAR
